Title: Chapter Eight: High Low
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), William N. Fordes (teleplay by), Tom Smuts (teleplay by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: Bosch gains a new ally in his ex-wife Eleanor. Deputy Chief Irving makes a series of deals that will shape the future of the police department - and possibly even the city itself. Waits's disturbing focus on Bosch intensifies.
